attributes.action: Request the Traffic Commisioners for the South West penalise First Bus Bristol,unless they make immediate improvements to bus services 2425
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite many complaints from the public and local politicians concerning the poor service of the 24/25 bus services in South Bristol,First Bus Bristol continue to ignore the complaints and concerns of residents.
They operate a service that ignores their own timetables and offer no reasonable or genuine excuses for the non appearance of scheduled buses.
The Traffic Commisioner for the South West should penalise First Bus on a daily basis until they provide the service contracted for.
